channel.title: Texture thing and addon issues
channel.description: In Lambda Core, specifically map bm_c3a2h, the texture for the hornet gun on one of the alien grunts is missing and no matter what I do, I get the same result. And I had this one addon called "Shepard in Lambda Core" and now it's gone off the workshop and I liked that addon very much. What happened to it? And what do I do about the hive gun texture? ![20160530204511_1.jpg|690x500](upload://fK3uTCJ8wEMQa29pPWZQFshQSUg.jpeg)

item.title: Texture thing and addon issues
item.dc:creator: NickTheGamer
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

That mod would have broken with the recent updates. We fixed the missing Hivehand textures, which required a map recompile. The Shepherd mod would have required a map recompile too. So you have 2 incompatible different versions of the map fighting for dominance.

I guess the update to fix that must not be getting through or something. I’m reinstalling the game to make sure it’s fixed. Also by the way, when I pass through the loading point into bm_c3a2h I get a Node Graph out of date thing.

Read full topic

item.title: Texture thing and addon issues
item.dc:creator: KevinJRattman
item.description:
The Shephard mod is still in workshop, it’s not deleted:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=576153898

I know for a fact because I am very related with the creator of this addon!

For now, simply unsubscribe and wait for the fix to come, and then re-subscribe. That’s the only way.

Read full topic

item.title: Texture thing and addon issues
item.dc:creator: Kaltsu
item.description:
TextFAMGUY1:

That mod would have broken with the recent updates. We fixed the missing Hivehand textures, which required a map recompile. The Shepherd mod would have required a map recompile too. So you have 2 incompatible different versions of the map fighting for dominance.

Regarding to maps, if I have a Workshop-creation that contains modified .bsp´s like c1a0a, c1a1a, c1a1b, c1a1c and c2a1b, should I recompile them? Last time I updated those maps was right after the Crossfire Update.

Read full topic

item.title: Texture thing and addon issues
item.dc:creator: Kaltsu
item.description:
Unless the creator of that addon is registered to this forum, nobody here can tell you what happened to it. I´m guessing that his mod got incompatible with the recent updates, so he removed it.

Read full topic

item.title: Texture thing and addon issues

item.description:
In Lambda Core, specifically map bm_c3a2h, the texture for the hornet gun on one of the alien grunts is missing and no matter what I do, I get the same result. And I had this one addon called “Shepard in Lambda Core” and now it’s gone off the workshop and I liked that addon very much. What happened to it? And what do I do about the hive gun texture?
